name: Machamp
description: It quickly swings its four arms to rock its opponents with ceaseless punches and chops from all angles.

attacks.name: Vital Throw
attacks.effect: You may do 40 damage plus 20 more damage. If you do, Machamp does 20 damage to itself.

attacks.name: Hundred Furious Punches
attacks.effect: Does 60 damage plus 10 more damage for each Fighting Energy attached to Machamp.
